definition: rice flour/rice-flour noodles/(Internet slang) Xiaomi fan
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Rice noodles are the most famous snack in Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 米粉是桂林久负盛名的小吃。

sentences.english: Mohinga, rice noodles in fish soup, is widely considered to be Burma's national dish.
sentences.chinese: 鱼板面，即鱼汤米粉，被普遍认为是缅甸的大众食物。

sentences.english: I dredged his fish in cornmeal and fried it over the fire.
sentences.chinese: 我在鱼上撒了玉米粉，放在篝火上烤。

sentences.english: I left a message about Guilin Rice noodle is good too.
sentences.chinese: 我离开的消息对桂林米粉是好的太多。

sentences.english: A study on the processing technology of instant fresh Mifen (rice noodle)had been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 本文对方便鲜米粉的加工技术进行了试验研究。

sentences.english: Rice noodles are the most famous snack in Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 米粉是桂林久负盛名的小吃。

sentences.english: CeO_2 nano-powders were synthesized by a carbon absorption and combustion method.
sentences.chinese: 采用碳吸附燃烧法制备氧化铈纳米粉体。

sentences.english: Then she asked whether I could take her to eat the Guilin rice noodle.
sentences.chinese: 接着她问我是否可以带她吃桂林米粉。

sentences.english: Other stuffed rice pasta, whether or not cooked or otherwise prepared, not containing meat.
sentences.chinese: 其它夹馅米粉条，不论是否烹饪或调制者，不含肉者。

sentences.english: The dumplings are made of sticky rice flour stuffed with different fillings.
sentences.chinese: 元宵由糯米粉制成，跟饺子一样佐以不同馅料。

sentences.english: If you are in a hurry, I would recommend fried rice noodles or shredded chicken fired rice.
sentences.chinese: 如果您赶时间，我建议您来个炒米粉或鸡肉碎炒饭。

sentences.english: Tangyuan is made from glutinous rice flour.
sentences.chinese: 汤圆是由糯米粉做成的。

sentences.english: Produced process is laying the pulp mill of the rice noodle on the bamboo steamer to steam.
sentences.chinese: 制作时，将磨好的米粉浆平铺于竹蒸笼上蒸制。

sentences.english: Maggie: It's sweet dumplings made of glutinous rice flour.
sentences.chinese: 是一种用糯米粉做成的甜汤圆。

sentences.english: The influences of various technology parameters on the properties of nanopowders by Anodic Arc Plasma were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对影响纳米粉性能的各种工艺参数进行了理论分析。

sentences.english: Therefore, my classmates called me "noodle girl" at that time.
sentences.chinese: 因此同学们都改叫我“米粉妹”。

definition: rice noodle roll, a roll made from sheets of rice flour dough, steamed and stuffed with meat, vegetables etc
nian gao, New Year cake, typically a sweet, steamed cake made with glutinous rice flour
a kind of rice-flour noodles from Yunnan province
vermicelli made from mung bean starch etc
